keys: líricas de parachoques de la etiqueta engomada
resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Israel From Bumper to Bumper: Stickers Rapped by Hadag Hanachash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel von Stoßdämpfer zu Stoßdämpfer: 
Aufkleber klopften durch Hadag Hanachash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel du butoir au butoir : Les 
autocollants ont frappé par Hadag Hanachash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel do amortecedor ao amortecedor: As 
etiquetas bateram por Hadag Hanachash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Israele dal respingente al respingente: 
Autoadesivi colpiti da Hadag Hanachash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισραήλ από τον προφυλακτήρα στον προφυλακτήρα: 
Αυτοκόλλητες ετικέττες που κτυπιούνται από Hadag 
Hanachash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Israel del tope al tope: Las etiquetas 
engomadas criticaron mordazmente por Hadag Hanachash</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this fun lesson, explores Israeli politics, culture and values through the lyrics of a popular Israeli hip-hong song. Good for formal and informal environments.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hadag nachash</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bumper sticker lyrics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israeli center</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Spaßlektion erforscht israelische 
Politik, Kultur und Werte durch die Lyriken eines populären 
israelischen Hüfte-hong Lieds. Gut für die formalen und 
formlosen Umgebungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon d'amusement, explore la 
politique, la culture et les valeurs israéliennes par le lyrique 
d'une chanson israélienne populaire de hanche-hong. Bon pour 
les environnements formels et sans cérémonie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição do divertimento, explora a 
política, a cultura e valores israeli através dos lyrics de uma 
canção israeli popular do hip-hong-hong. Bom para ambientes 
formais e informais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione di divertimento, esplora la 
politica israeliana, coltivano e valori attraverso i lyrics di una 
canzone israeliana popolare dell'anca-hong. Buon per gli 
ambienti convenzionali ed informali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα διασκέδασης, ερευνά την ισραηλινούς
πολιτική, τον πολιτισμό και τις τιμές μέσω των λυρικών ποιημάτων
ενός δημοφιλούς ισραηλινού τραγουδιού ισχίο-Hong. Αγαθό
για τα επίσημα και άτυπα περιβάλλοντα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección de la diversión, explora 
política, la cultura y valores israelíes a través de las líricas 
de una canción israelí popular de la cadera-hong. Bueno para 
los ambientes formales e informales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hadag nachash</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">StoßaufkleberLyriken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israelische Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nachash de hadag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lyrique de butoir d'autocollant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre israélien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nachash do hadag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lyrics abundantes da etiqueta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro israeli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nachash del hadag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lyrics bumper dell'autoadesivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro israeliano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">hadag nachash</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λυρικά ποιήματα αυτοκόλλητων ετικεττών προφυλακτήρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro israelí</string>
          </keyword>
